-- DaoRegion_D2_Select -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 SELECT [RegionID], [RegionDescription] FROM [Region]
WHERE AND [RegionID] = @RegionIDAND [RegionID] IS NULL AND [RegionID] LIKE @RegionID_Like AND [RegionDescription] = @RegionDescriptionAND [RegionDescription] IS NULL AND [RegionDescription] LIKE @RegionDescription_Like
